name: Sunray Valley
description:
Explore a tiny village at your own pace. 

Standalone tech demo for LOWREZJAM'17. A larger world is under development @soft_wizard.

Tips: 

Press Z and X together to interact with tiles.

In the menus, Z accepts, X cancels.

Notes:

20/08/17: Performance update.

20/08/17: Added Mac port by @xypotion.
